description: Detect SELECT SINGLE with explicit field list. Allows optional INTO (incl. CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF and @DATA(...)) between FROM and WHERE, supports multiline.
suggested_replacement: SELECT $1 FROM $2$3 UP TO 1 ROWS WHERE $4 ORDER BY $1. ENDSELECT.

description: Detect SELECT SINGLE * FROM ...; allows optional INTO (incl. CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF and @DATA(...)) between FROM and WHERE, supports multiline.
suggested_replacement: SELECT * FROM $1$2 UP TO 1 ROWS WHERE $3 ORDER BY PRIMARY KEY. ENDSELECT.

description: SELECT (multi/single line) with/without JOINs without FOR ALL ENTRIES into an internal table; capture field list, FROM, INTO <TABLE phrase> <itab>, WHERE. Suggest adding ORDER BY (field list) in the SELECT.
suggested_replacement: SELECT $1 FROM $2 INTO $3 $4 WHERE $5 ORDER BY $1. ENDSELECT

description: SELECT * (multi/single line) with/without JOINs without FOR ALL ENTRIES into an internal table; capture FROM, INTO <TABLE phrase> <itab>, WHERE. Suggest adding ORDER BY PRIMARY KEY in the SELECT.
suggested_replacement: SELECT * FROM $1 INTO $2 $3 WHERE $4 ORDER BY PRIMARY KEY. ENDSELECT
